caption.center: Carter Earl FROST v. STATE of Mississippi.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 5926 from Judgment dated Feb. 14, 1991, Clarence E. Morgan Jr., Ruling Judge, Grenada County Circuit Court.
opinion.attorneys:
Robert T. Laster Jr., Carothers Fedric Laster, Grenada, for appellant.
Michael C. Moore, Atty. Gen., Deirdre McCrory, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before DAN M. LEE, P.J., and PRATHER and ROBERTSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
ROY NOBLE LEE, C.J., HAWKINS, P.J., SULLIVAN, PITTMAN, BANKS and McRAE, JJ., concur.Page 52
